title: Requirements Gathering for Neural Cryptography System
description: Define the system's functional and non-functional requirements based on the project description and user needs. Include security, performance, scalability, usability, and accessibility considerations, with a focus on ensuring secure communication using unique brain patterns for encryption and decryption.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop a high-level design for the NeuralCryptographySystem, including components like neural network models, encryption/decryption algorithms, and system interfaces.

title: Develop Neural Network Models for Unique Brain Pattern Recognition
description: Create and train neural network models capable of identifying unique brain patterns for encryption/decryption purposes. This task involves selecting appropriate algorithms, training the models with real-world data, optimizing them for efficiency, and ensuring robustness and security. The focus will be on both model creation and fine-tuning.

title: Implement Encryption/Decryption Algorithms
description: Write the code for the encryption and decryption algorithms based on the neural network models.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create an intuitive and user-friendly interface for the NeuralCryptographySystem.

title: Develop Database Schema for NeuralCryptographySystem
description: Define the structure and relationships of the database required for storing user data, brain pattern information, and any necessary metadata. The design should consider scalability, performance, and security. This schema will be utilized in conjunction with our system architecture to ensure seamless integration.

title: Implement Database Scheme
description: Develop the database based on the defined schema.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Combine the developed components and test the overall system functionality.

title: Security Review
description: Evaluate the system's security measures and ensure that the NeuralCryptographySystem is secure enough for user data protection.

title: Documentation
description: Write clear, concise, and comprehensive documentation for the NeuralCryptographySystem. This includes user guides, API references, and internal development documentation. Ensure that the documentation is easily accessible, searchable, and understandable by various levels of users (developers, system administrators, and end-users). The documentation should also include detailed explanations of the encryption and decryption processes, security measures in place, and best practices for usage.
